title: Mascara
description: Mascara delves into the dark terrain of identity and disguise when the lives of three people collide. A nameless man with a face no one remembers has the devastating ability to see and capture on film the brutal truths lurking inside each person he encounters. Oriana, a beautiful woman with the memory of an innocent child, is relentlessly pursued by mysterious figures from her past. Doctor Mavirelli is a brilliant and power-hungry plastic surgeon who controls societyâ€™s most prominent figures by shaping their faces. The twining of these three fates plays out in a climactic unmasking.
author: Ariel Dorfman
